name: SVGTextContentElement
description: The SVGTextContentElement interface is implemented by elements that support rendering child text content. It is inherited by various text-related interfaces, such as SVGTextElement, SVGTSpanElement, SVGTRefElement, SVGAltGlyphElement and SVGTextPathElement.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.textLength
members.description: An SVGAnimatedLength reflecting the textLength attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.lengthAdjust
members.description: AnÂ SVGAnimatedEnumeration reflecting the lengthAdjust attribute of the given element. The numeric type values represent one of the constant values above.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getNumberOfChars()
members.description: Returns a long representing the total number of addressable characters available for rendering within the current element, regardless of whether they will be rendered.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getComputedTextLength()
members.description: Returns a float representing the computed length for the text within the element.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getSubStringLength()
members.description: Returns a float representing the computed length of the formatted text advance distance for a substring of text within the element.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getStartPositionOfChar()
members.description: Returns a DOMPoint representing the position of a typographic character after text layout has been performed. Note: In SVG 1.1 this method returned an SVGPoint.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getEndPositionOfChar()
members.description: Returns a DOMPoint representing the trailing position of a typographic character after text layout has been performed. Note: In SVG 1.1 this method returned an SVGPoint.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getExtentOfChar()
members.description: Returns a DOMRect representing the computed tight bounding box of the glyph cell that corresponds to a given typographic character.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getRotationOfChar()
members.description: Returns a float representing the rotation of typographic character.

members.name: SVGTextContentElement.getCharNumAtPosition()
members.description: Returns a long representing the character which caused a text glyph to be rendered at a given position in the coordinate system. Because the relationship between characters and glyphs is not one-to-one, only the first character of the relevant typographic character is returned
